Title: The Smog Cutter
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Michael Connelly (creator), Eric Ellis Overmyer (creator), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (written for television by)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Madison Lintz
Plot: The ugly truth behind his mother's murder has left LAPD homicide detective Harry Bosch as tense and restless as ever. A homeless veteran is murdered. Bosch works a high-profile trial ...
